author: metachris_
content: Wanted to double-check about SSZ-encoded HTTP request payloads -- the content-type would be "application/octet-stream", right?

author: sproul
content: yeah, although Lighthouse doesn't support this for some endpoints (e.g. <https://github.com/sigp/lighthouse/issues/4262>)

author: metachris_
content: thx! going to start accepting SSZ-encoded builder submissions at the relay: https://github.com/flashbots/mev-boost-relay/pull/388
